title: Now Everything’s Racist | Guests: Sen. Tom Cotton & Gavin McInnes | 6/24/20
description:
Glenn has a prediction about Mount Rushmore now that protesters have gone after statues of all four men. Sen. Tom Cotton is backing President Trump’s order to charge monument vandals and joins to explain why. Gad Saad, author of the upcoming book “The Parasitic Mind,” discusses how to break through parasitic ideas like white fragility and all-encompassing systemic racism. The FBI concluded that the noose found in NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace’s garage wasn’t a noose after all. Trump’s “favorite meme maker,” Carpe Donktum, joins after being permanently banned from Twitter. And Censored.TV founder Gavin McInnes was banned from YouTube for a comment he made on Parler, saying he’d take back the CHAZ on his birthday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
